General.Name: Shenyang Machine Tool Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenyang Machine Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells machine tools in China and internationally. Its products include horizontal and vertical machining centers; horizontal, vertical, and economic CNC lathes; five axis machine centers; ordinary machine tools; and other automation and industry products. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenyang, China.
General.Address: Shenyang Economic and Tech. Dev. Zne., Shenyang, China, 110142
